Bard (Bard Bard)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: April 1, 2016

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles. One such champion is Bard, a mystical caretaker of nature who roams the universe in search of forgotten magical artifacts. With his whimsical appearance and enigmatic personality, Bard has captured the hearts of many players. And now, he has a skin that perfectly embodies his essence - Bard Bard.

Bard Bard is a skin that adds a touch of humor and charm to Bard's already whimsical character. In this skin, Bard takes on the appearance of a lovable, anthropomorphic bird. He wears a feathered hat, a colorful cape, and carries a staff adorned with musical notes. The skin is filled with delightful details, such as the musical notes that trail behind Bard as he moves and the bird-like chirping sounds that accompany his abilities.

Released on April 1, 2016, Bard Bard quickly became a fan favorite. The skin perfectly captures Bard's playful nature and adds a lighthearted twist to his design. It is available for purchase in the in-game store for 975 RP, allowing players to transform Bard into the adorable bird-like creature.

Now, let's delve into the story behind Bard and his place in the League of Legends universe. Bard is a celestial being who hails from a realm known as the Cosmic Vastness. He is a guardian of nature and the caretaker of the meeps, small creatures that accompany him on his journeys. Bard's purpose is to maintain the equilibrium between the physical and spiritual realms, ensuring that the forces of chaos and order remain in balance.

In the game, Bard is classified as a support champion, excelling in providing utility and crowd control for his team. His abilities revolve around his mystical powers and his connection to the celestial realm. Bard's passive ability, Traveler's Call, allows him to collect chimes scattered throughout the map, enhancing his abilities and granting him additional experience and gold. His Q ability, Cosmic Binding, allows him to stun enemies by tethering them to walls or other enemies. Bard's W ability, Caretaker's Shrine, creates healing shrines that provide health and movement speed to allies. His E ability, Magical Journey, creates portals that allow Bard and his allies to quickly traverse the map. Finally, Bard's ultimate ability, Tempered Fate, freezes all units in a targeted area, rendering them invulnerable and unable to act for a short duration.

While Bard is a versatile champion with a unique playstyle, he does have his strengths and weaknesses. His ability to roam and provide map-wide utility makes him a valuable asset to any team. Bard's ability to set up plays with his Cosmic Binding and Magical Journey can catch enemies off guard and turn the tide of a battle. Additionally, his Tempered Fate ultimate can be a game-changer, allowing his team to engage or disengage from fights with precision.

However, Bard's reliance on collecting chimes to enhance his abilities can make him vulnerable in the early stages of the game. Additionally, his skill set requires good coordination and communication with his team to fully utilize his potential. Bard's ultimate ability, while powerful, can also be tricky to use effectively, as mistimed or misplaced ultimates can inadvertently save enemies or disrupt his own team's plans.

In conclusion, Bard Bard is a delightful skin that adds a touch of whimsy to Bard's character. With its charming design and playful animations, it is a must-have for any Bard enthusiast. Whether you're a fan of Bard's lore or simply enjoy his unique playstyle, Bard Bard is a skin that perfectly captures the essence of this mystical champion.

For more information about Bard and his various appearances, including Bard Bard, be sure to visit our page dedicated to Bard on the League of Legends website. There, you can find detailed information, videos, and more to enhance your Bard experience.

Bard (Snow Day Bard)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: December 10, 2015

Winter has arrived in the mystical realm of League of Legends, and with it comes the whimsical and enchanting Snow Day Bard skin. This delightful skin transforms the cosmic caretaker into a jolly snowman, spreading joy and merriment on the Rift. With its charming design and unique animations, Snow Day Bard is a must-have for any Bard enthusiast or collector of festive skins.

Snow Day Bard is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP. This skin was first released on December 10, 2015, just in time for the holiday season. It quickly became a fan favorite, capturing the hearts of players with its cheerful appearance and playful abilities.

The Story of Snow Day Bard

In the snowy regions of Freljord, where winter reigns supreme, Bard discovered a hidden portal that led him to a magical winter wonderland. Fascinated by the beauty and tranquility of this realm, Bard decided to embrace the spirit of the season and transform himself into a snowman. With his newfound appearance, Snow Day Bard set out on a mission to spread joy and happiness to all the champions of the League.

Donning a cozy scarf, a top hat, and a carrot nose, Snow Day Bard embodies the essence of winter. His chimes have been transformed into jingling sleigh bells, and his trusty meeps have become adorable snowballs. As he glides across the Rift, leaving behind a trail of snowflakes, Snow Day Bard brings a touch of magic to the battlefield.

Every ability of Snow Day Bard has been given a frosty makeover. His Q ability, Cosmic Binding, now shoots out icy projectiles that freeze enemies in place. When Bard activates his W ability, Caretaker's Shrine, a snow-covered healing shrine appears, providing warmth and rejuvenation to his allies. His E ability, Magical Journey, creates a sparkling ice tunnel that champions can slide through, leaving behind a trail of frost. And finally, his R ability, Tempered Fate, encases enemies in a giant snow globe, suspending them in time and space.

With its whimsical design and playful animations, Snow Day Bard is a visual treat for players. The attention to detail in this skin is remarkable, from the way Bard's snowman body bounces as he moves to the delicate snowflakes that surround him. The skin truly captures the joy and wonder of the winter season, making it a delightful addition to any player's collection.

The Story of Bard

Bard, the Wandering Caretaker, is a celestial being who roams the universe, collecting and distributing cosmic energy. He is an enigmatic champion who transcends time and space, existing outside the boundaries of mortal understanding. Bard's purpose is to maintain the delicate balance of the universe, ensuring that all realms and dimensions remain in harmony.

In the game, Bard is a support champion known for his unique abilities and playstyle. He excels at roaming and providing utility to his team, making him a valuable asset in both professional and casual play. Bard's passive ability, Traveler's Call, allows him to collect chimes scattered throughout the map, empowering his basic attacks and granting him additional experience and mana. His Q ability, Cosmic Binding, allows him to stun enemies by tethering them to walls or other champions. Bard's W ability, Caretaker's Shrine, creates healing shrines that provide health and movement speed to allies. His E ability, Magical Journey, creates portals that allow Bard and his allies to traverse walls and quickly move around the map. Finally, his R ability, Tempered Fate, allows Bard to freeze time for a few seconds, suspending all units in a targeted area.

Bard's strengths lie in his ability to control the battlefield and provide utility to his team. His roaming potential and map presence make him a formidable force, as he can quickly assist his allies in different lanes. Bard's ability to stun enemies with Cosmic Binding and freeze them in time with Tempered Fate can turn the tide of team fights and secure crucial objectives. Additionally, his healing shrines and portal creation offer strategic advantages and unique opportunities for his team.

However, Bard also has weaknesses that players must be mindful of. His early game can be challenging, as he relies on collecting chimes to scale and become more powerful. Bard's abilities require precise positioning and timing to be effective, making him a high-skill champion that requires practice and coordination. Furthermore, his ultimate ability, Tempered Fate, can be a double-edged sword if not used correctly, as it can inadvertently save enemies or disrupt the flow of a team fight.

In the lore of League of Legends, Bard's origins and true nature remain shrouded in mystery. He is an ancient being, older than the concept of time itself, and his purpose transcends mortal comprehension. Bard's presence in the game reflects his role as a cosmic caretaker, ensuring that the universe remains in balance. His enigmatic nature and otherworldly abilities make him a captivating and unique champion in the League of Legends roster.

For more information about Bard and his various appearances, including Snow Day Bard, you can visit the official League of Legends website or watch videos on platforms like YouTube. Explore the magical world of Bard and discover the wonders that await in the cosmic realm.

Remember, the power of the cosmos is in your hands, summoner. Embrace the whimsy of Snow Day Bard and spread joy on the Rift this winter season!

Bard (Default)

Release Date: Unknown

Bard's Default skin is the original appearance of the champion when he was first introduced to the League of Legends game. This skin does not have any additional effects or visual changes, but it represents the essence of Bard as a mystical and enigmatic champion.

Bard, also known as the Wandering Caretaker, is a support champion in League of Legends who roams the Summoner's Rift in search of cosmic harmony. He is a celestial being who travels through different dimensions, collecting ancient artifacts and spreading his wisdom to those who are willing to listen.

As the default skin, Bard appears as a humanoid figure adorned in a flowing robe, with a mask covering his face. He carries a magical instrument called the Meeps, which he uses to channel his abilities and create harmonious melodies. The Meeps are small, colorful creatures that accompany Bard on his journey, adding a touch of whimsy to his appearance.

Although the default skin does not have any additional visual effects, Bard's abilities are visually stunning on their own. His Q ability, Cosmic Binding, allows him to stun enemies by tethering them to walls or other champions. This ability is represented by a burst of cosmic energy that connects Bard to his target.

Bard's W ability, Caretaker's Shrine, creates healing shrines on the map that provide health and mana regeneration to allies. These shrines are represented by glowing orbs of energy that emanate a soothing aura.

Magical Journey, Bard's E ability, allows him to create portals that transport him and his allies across the map. These portals are depicted as shimmering gateways that open up in the fabric of reality, allowing swift travel between different locations.

Bard's ultimate ability, Tempered Fate, is perhaps his most iconic skill. It allows him to freeze time for all units within a certain area, rendering them invulnerable and unable to act. This ability is represented by a golden aura that envelops the affected area, suspending all movement and actions.

Now, let's delve into the lore and story of Bard. In the vast universe of League of Legends, Bard is an ancient being who exists outside of time and space. He is a cosmic entity tasked with maintaining the equilibrium between different dimensions and protecting the fabric of reality.

Bard's origins are shrouded in mystery, and his true nature remains unknown. Some believe he is a celestial being, while others think he is a manifestation of the universe itself. Regardless, Bard's purpose is clear - he is a guardian of cosmic harmony.

In the game, Bard's strengths lie in his ability to provide utility and support to his team. His healing shrines and portals allow for strategic positioning and quick rotations across the map. His stun and invulnerability ultimate can turn the tide of team fights and save allies from certain death.

However, Bard also has weaknesses. He lacks direct damage and relies heavily on his team to capitalize on his utility. His abilities require precise timing and positioning to be effective, making him a challenging champion to master. Additionally, Bard's roaming playstyle can leave his ADC vulnerable in the bot lane if not executed properly.

In the competitive scene, Bard has seen varying degrees of success. His unique playstyle and utility make him a popular pick among professional support players. His ability to impact multiple lanes and control objectives with his portals and ultimate can be game-changing in the hands of a skilled player.

Overall, Bard's Default skin represents the essence of the Wandering Caretaker. It showcases his enigmatic nature and his role as a cosmic guardian. While it may not have any additional visual effects, the default skin allows players to experience Bard in his original form, embracing the mystique and wonder of this celestial champion.

For more information about Bard and his various appearances, including skins and gameplay videos, you can visit the official League of Legends website or explore the champion's page on the game client.

Bard: The Wandering Caretaker

Release Date: March 12, 2015

Within the vast and mystical universe of League of Legends, there exists a celestial being known as Bard, the Wandering Caretaker. This enigmatic champion was introduced to the game on March 12, 2015, and has since captivated players with his unique playstyle and intriguing lore.

The Story of Bard

Bard's origins are shrouded in mystery, as he hails from a realm beyond the physical plane of Runeterra. He is an otherworldly being, connected to the ethereal energies of the cosmos. Unlike other champions who fight for power or glory, Bard's purpose lies in maintaining the equilibrium of the universe.

As the Wandering Caretaker, Bard roams across the countless dimensions, seeking out places where the fabric of reality is fraying. He mends these rifts, ensuring that the balance between order and chaos remains intact. Bard's journey is eternal, and his presence is often felt in the most unexpected corners of Runeterra.

Despite his cosmic nature, Bard is not an aloof or detached entity. He possesses a deep empathy for all living beings and strives to protect them from harm. He is often depicted as a benevolent figure, guiding lost souls and offering solace to those in need. Bard's enigmatic nature and his connection to the universe make him an intriguing and captivating champion within the League of Legends universe.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Bard's unique abilities make him a versatile champion, capable of fulfilling multiple roles within a team. His primary strength lies in his ability to provide exceptional utility and crowd control, making him a valuable asset in team fights and skirmishes.

One of Bard's most iconic abilities is his Q, Cosmic Binding. He fires out a burst of celestial energy that damages and stuns the first enemy hit. This ability can be used to initiate fights, catch enemies off guard, or peel for his allies. Bard's Q is a powerful tool that can turn the tide of battle when used effectively.

Another notable strength of Bard is his E, Magical Journey. This ability allows Bard to create portals on walls, enabling himself and his allies to swiftly traverse the map. This mobility makes Bard an excellent roamer and allows him to provide support to his teammates in various lanes. Additionally, Bard's E can be used creatively to escape dangerous situations or set up unexpected ganks.

While Bard possesses many strengths, he also has some weaknesses that players must be mindful of. One of his main weaknesses is his relatively low damage output compared to other champions. Bard's role is primarily that of a support, and his abilities are designed to aid his team rather than deal significant damage. As such, Bard relies heavily on his teammates to secure kills and deal damage in team fights.

Furthermore, Bard's ultimate ability, Tempered Fate, can be a double-edged sword if not used with precision. This ability allows Bard to put all units in a targeted area into stasis, effectively freezing them in time. While this can be a game-changing ability when used correctly, it can also inadvertently save enemies or disrupt the flow of a fight if mistimed or mispositioned.

Bard's Place in the Game

Bard's unique playstyle and versatile kit have made him a beloved champion among League of Legends players. His ability to roam and provide support from unexpected angles adds an element of surprise and strategy to the game. Bard's presence in the bot lane as a support champion has also opened up new possibilities for team compositions and playstyles.

As a support, Bard excels at setting up plays and controlling the battlefield. His ability to roam and provide vision allows him to assist his team in securing objectives and controlling map pressure. Bard's ultimate, Tempered Fate, can be a game-changer in team fights, allowing him to neutralize key threats or initiate engagements with precision timing.

Furthermore, Bard's unique passive ability, Traveler's Call, adds an additional layer of complexity to his gameplay. Collecting chimes scattered throughout the map empowers Bard's abilities, granting him increased power and utility as the game progresses. This mechanic encourages Bard players to roam and explore the map, further emphasizing his role as a wandering caretaker.

Overall, Bard's place in the game is that of a versatile support champion who brings utility, crowd control, and strategic depth to the team. His cosmic theme and enigmatic lore make him a captivating character, and his gameplay offers a refreshing and unique experience for players.

Explore Bard's Skins

On this page, you can access information and videos showcasing all of Bard's skins. From the whimsical Elderwood Bard to the cosmic beauty of Cosmic Defender Bard, each skin offers a distinct visual and thematic experience. Whether you prefer the ethereal or the whimsical, Bard's skins provide a delightful array of options to suit every player's taste.

Discover the full range of Bard's skins and immerse yourself in the cosmic wonders of this enigmatic champion.
